item.title: ojmason
item.description:
ojmason

Hello, I’m Oliver. I am a computational linguist, interested in applications of NLP and AI in understanding texts and conversing with human beings.

I am a passionate dinghy sailor, sailing an Enterprise or a Laser at Midland Sailing Club in the UK. I am also a qualified Dinghy Instructor, and run the RYA training centre at the club.
